about_the_game:
Medieval diner sim with roguelike elements!

In a kingdom that has outlawed potion making, an herbalist turned brew-master continues to sell potions on the underground market from the back of their tavern. Serve both ale and potions to customers, but don't get caught selling potions when the guards make their rounds!

Features:

  • Earn gold by serving drinks to customers.

  • Brew potions in the back storeroom by playing a timing-based minigame.

  • Guards will be on the lookout for illegal potion sales - don't get caught!

  • Purchase tavern upgrades at the end of each day.

  • Expand your tavern to accommodate more customers and serve new menu items.

  • Encounter over a dozen special customers that can change the direction of your run.

  • World events can change your entire shift.
